description: Extremely weak, incompetent, or of poor quality.

examples.chinese: 只看比赛,他确实弱爆了
examples.translation: Judging by the match, he really sucks.

examples.chinese: 今天的运势真是弱爆了!从早上得了感冒一直到现在头重脚轻～
examples.translation: My luck today is super weak! Caught a cold this morning and have been dizzy ever since.

examples.chinese: 都说宝宝像爸爸,笑起来更像爸爸,感觉我的基因弱爆了
examples.translation: They say all the kids look like dad, especially when they smile. My genes are so weak.

examples.chinese: 今天骑了一个小时自行车,发现腿就软了,身体真的弱爆了
examples.translation: Rode a bike for an hour today and my legs gave out. My body is really too weak.
